name: Hot Goose Game - the game of love
name_original: Hot Goose Game - the game of love
description:
Looking to spice up your love life?
Hot Goose Game is the perfect game for you and your partner to make your meetings fun.

It's a love game where players perform daring sex challenges:
for each box, each player must pay lien doing something sexually pleasing the partner's body.

Features:
- two players
- sounds
- nice graphics
